Governance and Risk Management.description: Encompasses the oversight, direction, and control of information security activities, including risk identification, assessment, and mitigation strategies.

subcategories.name: Risk Management
subcategories.description: Processes to identify, assess, prioritize, and address security risks to the organization.

subcategories.name: Audit Assurance
subcategories.description: Activities for providing independent verification of security controls and compliance status.

subcategories.name: ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance)
subcategories.description: Framework addressing sustainability, social responsibility, and ethical governance concerns.

subcategories.name: Organizational Security Structure
subcategories.description: Formal structure defining security roles, responsibilities, and reporting relationships.

Policy Management.description: Development, implementation, and maintenance of security policies, standards, and procedures.

subcategories.name: Acceptable Use Policy
subcategories.description: Guidelines for appropriate use of information systems and assets by employees and users.

subcategories.name: Security Policies
subcategories.description: Formal statements of rules and guidelines for protecting information assets.

subcategories.name: Legal and Compliance Requirements
subcategories.description: Addresses legal obligations, regulatory requirements, and contractual commitments.

Identity and Access Management.description: Processes and technologies to ensure appropriate access to resources by managing digital identities and entitlements.

subcategories.name: Access Control
subcategories.description: Mechanisms to regulate who can view or use resources in a computing environment.

subcategories.name: Password Policy and Authentication Procedures
subcategories.description: Standards for credential management and verification of user identities.

subcategories.name: Privileged Access Management
subcategories.description: Controls for managing and securing elevated access rights to critical systems.

subcategories.name: Session Management
subcategories.description: Processes to secure user sessions and prevent unauthorized access through session hijacking.

Human Resources Security.description: Security practices related to employees throughout their employment lifecycle, from hiring to termination.

subcategories.name: Security Awareness and Training
subcategories.description: Programs to educate staff about security threats and their responsibilities.

subcategories.name: Personnel Security
subcategories.description: Processes to ensure employees meet security requirements throughout employment.

subcategories.name: HR Security Practices
subcategories.description: Security measures during hiring, employment changes, and termination processes.

Asset Management.description: Processes for identifying, tracking, and protecting information assets throughout their lifecycle.

subcategories.name: Asset Inventory and Classification
subcategories.description: Identifying, documenting, and categorizing information assets based on value and sensitivity.

subcategories.name: Media Management
subcategories.description: Controls for handling physical and electronic media containing sensitive information.

subcategories.name: Asset Lifecycle Management
subcategories.description: Processes for managing assets from acquisition through retirement and disposal.

Data Governance.description: Framework for managing data assets to ensure availability, usability, integrity, and security.

subcategories.name: Data Governance and Classification
subcategories.description: Framework for defining data ownership, access rights, and sensitivity levels.

subcategories.name: Data Retention and Deletion
subcategories.description: Policies governing how long information is kept and procedures for secure disposal.

subcategories.name: Data Security
subcategories.description: Measures to protect data confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

subcategories.name: Privacy and Compliance
subcategories.description: Controls to ensure adherence to privacy regulations and protection of personal information.

Encryption and Key Management.description: Implementation and management of cryptographic solutions to protect information confidentiality and integrity.

subcategories.name: Cryptographic Controls
subcategories.description: Implementation of encryption algorithms and protocols to protect information.

subcategories.name: Key Management
subcategories.description: Processes for generating, storing, protecting, and rotating cryptographic keys.

subcategories.name: Certificate Management
subcategories.description: Administration of digital certificates throughout their lifecycle.

Network Security.description: Protection of network infrastructure and data transmission from unauthorized access and attacks.

subcategories.name: Network Architecture
subcategories.description: Design of network components and topology with security considerations.

subcategories.name: Network Controls
subcategories.description: Technologies and processes to monitor, filter, and secure network traffic.

subcategories.name: Wireless Security
subcategories.description: Protections for wireless network infrastructure and communications.

subcategories.name: Perimeter Security
subcategories.description: Defenses at network boundaries to prevent unauthorized access.

Endpoint Security.description: Protection of end-user devices such as laptops, desktops, mobile devices, and servers from threats.

subcategories.name: Anti-virus and Malware Control
subcategories.description: Tools and processes to prevent, detect, and remove malicious software.

subcategories.name: Mobile Device Security
subcategories.description: Controls to secure smartphones, tablets, and other portable computing devices.

subcategories.name: Server Security
subcategories.description: Hardening and protection measures for server infrastructure.

subcategories.name: Patch Management
subcategories.description: Processes for identifying, testing, and applying software updates and security patches.

Application Security.description: Practices to improve software security throughout the development lifecycle and in production.

subcategories.name: Application Design and Development
subcategories.description: Security practices integrated into application design and development processes.

subcategories.name: Software Development Life Cycle
subcategories.description: Security activities throughout the software development process.

subcategories.name: API Security
subcategories.description: Controls to protect application programming interfaces from attacks and misuse.

subcategories.name: Artificial Intelligence Security
subcategories.description: Security measures for AI systems including machine learning models and algorithms.

Vulnerability and Threat Management.description: Processes to identify, assess, prioritize, and remediate security vulnerabilities and threats.

subcategories.name: Vulnerability Assessment
subcategories.description: Systematic evaluation of security weaknesses in systems and applications.

subcategories.name: Penetration Testing
subcategories.description: Authorized simulated attacks to identify exploitable security weaknesses.

subcategories.name: Threat Intelligence
subcategories.description: Collection and analysis of information about potential and current threats.

subcategories.name: Remediation Management
subcategories.description: Processes for addressing and resolving identified security vulnerabilities.

Logging, Monitoring and Security Operati.description: Continuous surveillance of systems and network activities to detect and respond to security events.

subcategories.name: Security Event Monitoring
subcategories.description: Real-time observation of security-relevant activities and events.

subcategories.name: Audit Trails
subcategories.description: Chronological records of system activities for reconstruction, review, and examination.

subcategories.name: Security Analytics
subcategories.description: Advanced analysis of security data to identify patterns, anomalies, and potential threats.

subcategories.name: Security Operations Center
subcategories.description: Centralized function for continuous security monitoring and incident response.

Incident Management.description: Processes to identify, respond to, and recover from security incidents while minimizing impact.

subcategories.name: Incident Response
subcategories.description: Organized approach to addressing and managing the aftermath of security breaches.

subcategories.name: Incident Investigation
subcategories.description: Examination of security incidents to determine cause, scope, and impact.

subcategories.name: Incident Reporting
subcategories.description: Documentation and communication of security incidents to stakeholders.

subcategories.name: Lessons Learned
subcategories.description: Post-incident analysis to improve security posture and incident response capabilities.

Change and Configuration Management.description: Controls to ensure secure and controlled modifications to IT systems and configurations.

subcategories.name: Change Control
subcategories.description: Processes for requesting, approving, implementing, and reviewing changes to IT systems.

subcategories.name: Configuration Management
subcategories.description: Maintaining consistent system configurations and tracking changes to configurations.

subcategories.name: Release Management
subcategories.description: Planning, scheduling, and controlling the deployment of software releases.

subcategories.name: System Hardening
subcategories.description: Process of securing systems by reducing attack surface and eliminating vulnerabilities.

Business Continuity and Disaster Recover.description: Planning and preparations to ensure business operations can continue during and after disruptions.

subcategories.name: Business Impact Analysis
subcategories.description: Assessment of potential effects of disruptions on business operations.

subcategories.name: Continuity Planning
subcategories.description: Development of strategies to maintain business operations during disruptions.

subcategories.name: Backup Policy and Procedures
subcategories.description: Standards and processes for creating and managing data backups.

subcategories.name: Disaster Recovery Testing
subcategories.description: Validation of recovery capabilities through simulated disaster scenarios.

Physical and Environmental Security.description: Protection of physical assets, facilities, and supporting infrastructure from physical threats.

subcategories.name: Facility Security
subcategories.description: Measures to secure physical premises against unauthorized access and threats.

subcategories.name: Environmental Controls
subcategories.description: Systems to maintain appropriate environmental conditions for equipment operation.

subcategories.name: Physical Access Management
subcategories.description: Controls governing entry to facilities and secured areas.

subcategories.name: Equipment Security
subcategories.description: Protection of hardware assets from theft, damage, or tampering.

Third-Party Management.description: Oversight of external service providers, vendors, and supply chain to manage security risks.

subcategories.name: Supply Chain/Vendor Management
subcategories.description: Processes for managing security risks associated with suppliers and vendors.

subcategories.name: Vendor Assessment
subcategories.description: Evaluation of third-party security practices and compliance with requirements.

subcategories.name: Cloud Service Providers
subcategories.description: Security considerations specific to cloud computing environments and providers.

subcategories.name: Hosting Security
subcategories.description: Security measures for environments where systems and applications are hosted.

System Integration and Interoperability.description: Security aspects of connecting and enabling communication between different systems and applications.

subcategories.name: Integration Security
subcategories.description: Security controls for connecting disparate systems and applications.

subcategories.name: Interoperability and Portability
subcategories.description: Standards and practices enabling secure data exchange between different systems.

subcategories.name: API Integration Management
subcategories.description: Governance and security of application programming interface integrations.

subcategories.name: System Interfaces
subcategories.description: Security of connections and data exchange points between systems.
